name: Ferus-The dark abyss
description:
Finally a vacation!
After a long time, it's time for holidays and you decide to relax in the grove near your home


Watch where you step!
Your holidays have become a survival challenge now...


Be aware of your surroundings
Pay attention to what is hidden in the darkness, if you want to get out alive you will have to sharpen your wits!


Your health first
Your physical condition can worsen if you are too rash, proceed with caution.

  • Survival horror where you will have to explore the area where you are to be able to find the exit, be careful not to overheat your smartphone and not to strain your lungs too much.
  • 3 great levels available.
  • fear and anxiety insured.
